services.title: Website Development
services.subtitle: Modern, Fast & Optimized Websites
services.description: Your website is your digital storefront—it should be fast, engaging, and optimized for success. I build custom, high-performance websites using WordPress and modern front-end technologies, ensuring a seamless experience for your users.
includedItems: Custom Design & Development – Tailored to your brand and audience.
SEO Optimization – Better visibility on search engines.
Mobile-Responsive Design – Perfect on all devices.
Performance & Security – Speed and protection for a reliable site.
Scalability – Built to grow with your business.
services.ctaText: Let's create a website that stands out and drives results. Get in touch today!

services.title: E-Commerce Development
services.subtitle: Sell Online with a Powerful Store
services.description: A well-built online store can boost your sales and improve customer experience. I develop high-performing e-commerce websites using WooCommerce, ensuring your store is fast, secure, and easy to manage.
includedItems: Custom Store Design – Beautiful, user-friendly layouts.
Payment & Shipping Integration – Secure and seamless transactions.
Product Management System – Easy to add, edit, and organize products.
Mobile Optimization – A smooth shopping experience on any device.
SEO & Speed Optimization – Better rankings and faster performance.
services.ctaText: Whether you're starting a new store or upgrading an existing one, I'll help you sell more with an optimized e-commerce platform. Let's build your online store today!

services.title: Frontend React Development
services.subtitle: Scalable & Modern Web Apps
services.description: Elevate your web presence with dynamic, fast-loading, and interactive user interfaces built with React.js. I bring your ideas to life with cutting-edge frontend development that prioritizes user experience, performance, and SEO. Whether it's a single-page application or a complex web app, my React.js solutions are designed to engage users and boost your business.
includedItems: Custom React Development – Tailored components and UI for your needs.
State Management (Redux, Context API) – Scalable and efficient apps.
API Integrations – Connect your app with back-end services.
Performance Optimization – Fast loading speeds and smooth interactions.
Responsive & Accessible Design – Works perfectly on all devices.
services.ctaText: Let's bring your web application to life with cutting-edge front-end technology. Start your project today!

services.title: Webmaster Service
services.subtitle: Keep Your Website Running Smoothly
services.description: Your website is a crucial part of your business—don't let technical issues slow you down. With my Webmaster Service, I ensure your site stays secure, updated, and performing at its best.
includedItems: Website Maintenance – Regular updates for WordPress, plugins, and themes.
Security & Backups – Protect your site with security monitoring and scheduled backups.
Performance Optimization – Improve loading speed and user experience.
Content Updates – Need to change text, images, or add new pages? I've got you covered.
Troubleshooting & Support – Quick fixes for bugs, errors, and technical issues.
services.ctaText: Let me handle the technical side so you can focus on growing your business. Get in touch today!
